AT.name: Zack and Wiki™: Der Schatz von Barbaros
AT.description: Begib dich bei dem Abenteuerspiel Zack & Wiki: Barbaros Schatz für die Wii in eine Welt der Puzzles und der Seeräuber. Im Hause Capcom ausschließlich für die Wii konzipiert, wirst du dir bei diesem Abenteuer, das wie ein Puzzle aufgebaut ist, bei dem man zielen und klicken muss, den Kopf zerbrechen, während du den angehenden Piraten Zack und seinen Kumpel Wiki, den Affen, auf der Suche nach unermesslichen Reichtümern durch Levels geleitest, die wahrlich ein Blickfang sind. Als Anfängerpirat verbringt Zack seine Tage damit, nach einem lange verschollenen Schatz zu suchen, von dem erzählt wird, er sei auf einer rätselhaften Insel vergraben. Eines Tages stolpert Zack über einen sprechenden Totenkopf, der sich als Überrest des legendären Piraten Barbaros erweist. Barbaros Geist verspricht Zack, ihn zu der gesuchten Insel zu führen, wenn der junge Pirat den Fluch aufhebt, der auf ihm liegt und ihn wieder zum Leben erweckt, indem er Schätze aus Kisten sammelt, die über sieben gefährliche Orte verstreut sind.

AU.name: Zack and Wiki™: Quest for Barbaros' Treasure
AU.description: Enter a world of puzzles and piracy in Wii adventure Zack and Wiki: Quest for Barbaros’ Treasure. Crafted exclusively for Wii by Capcom, this point-and-click puzzle-solving adventure will have you racking your brains as you guide budding pirate Zack and his sidekick Wiki the monkey through eye-popping levels in search of untold riches. As an apprentice pirate, Zack spends his days searching for a long lost treasure that is said to be buried on a mysterious island. One day, he stumbles across a talking skull that turns out to be part of the remains of legendary pirate Barbaros. The ghost of Barbaros promises to lead Zack to the island he seeks if the young pirate will lift the curse he has been placed under and bring him back to life by collecting treasure from chests scattered throughout seven dangerous locations.

BG.name: Zack and Wiki™: Quest for Barbaros' Treasure
BG.description: Enter a world of puzzles and piracy in Wii adventure Zack and Wiki: Quest for Barbaros’ Treasure. Crafted exclusively for Wii by Capcom, this point-and-click puzzle-solving adventure will have you racking your brains as you guide budding pirate Zack and his sidekick Wiki the monkey through eye-popping levels in search of untold riches. As an apprentice pirate, Zack spends his days searching for a long lost treasure that is said to be buried on a mysterious island. One day, he stumbles across a talking skull that turns out to be part of the remains of legendary pirate Barbaros. The ghost of Barbaros promises to lead Zack to the island he seeks if the young pirate will lift the curse he has been placed under and bring him back to life by collecting treasure from chests scattered throughout seven dangerous locations.

BE.name: Zack and Wiki™ : Le Trésor de Barbaros
BE.description: Entrez dans un monde d'énigmes et de pirates dans l'aventure de Zack & Wiki: le Trésor de Barbaros. Conçue par Capcom en exclusivité pour Wii, cette aventure "point-and-click" jonchée d'énigmes à résoudre mettra votre matière grise à contribution lorsque vous guiderez Zack et son acolyte Wiki le singe à travers des niveaux époustouflants pour retrouver un trésor perdu. En tant qu'apprenti pirate, Zack n'a qu'une idée en tête : retrouver un trésor disparu censé être enterré sur une île mystérieuse. Un jour, il croise sur son passage un crâne parlant qui s'avère être une partie de la relique de Barbaros, un pirate légendaire. Le fantôme de Barbaros fait alors serment de guider Zack vers cette île mystérieuse en échange de quoi le jeune pirate devra lever la malédiction qui s'est abattu sur lui et le ramener à la vie en collectant le trésor des divers coffres disséminés à travers sept régions périlleuses.

ES.name: Zack and Wiki™: En busca del Tesoro de Barbaros
ES.description: Sumérgete en el mundo de los puzzles y la piratería en una aventura para Wii: Zack and Wiki: Quest for Barbaros’ Treasure. Capcom ha diseñado en exclusiva para Wii este emocionante juego lleno de puzzles que se resuelven con un toque del Mando de Wii. Los puzzles te obligarán a exprimirte el cerebro mientras guías a tu amigo el pirata Zack y a su compañero el mono Wiki a través de impresionantes escenarios en busca de incalculables riquezas. Zack es aprendiz de pirata y se pasa el día buscando un viejo tersoro, que según cuenta la leyenda, está enterrado en una isla misteriosa. Un día, encuentra una calavera parlante que resulta ser del legendario pirata Barbaros. El fantasma de Barbaros le promete a Zack que lo llevará hasta la isla que busca si el joven consigue librarlo de la maldición que pesa sobre él y le devuelve la vida. Para ello, tendrá que recoger diversos tesoros de unos cofres que están olvidados en siete lugares muy peligrosos.

FI.description: Enter a world of puzzles and piracy in Wii adventure Zack and Wiki: Quest for Barbaros’ Treasure. IT.name: Zack and Wiki™: il tesoro del pirata Barbaro
IT.description: Entra nel mondo di rompicapi e avventure piratesche di Zack & Wiki: il tesoro del pirata Barbaros, il gioco creato da Capcom in esclusiva per Wii. In questa avventura dovrai risolvere vari rompicapi e spremerti le meningi mentre guidi il simpatico pirata Zack e la scimmia Wiki attraverso spassosi livelli, in cerca di tesori segreti. Zack, apprendista pirata, trascorre le sue giornate alla ricera di un tesoro perduto molto tempo fa, probabilmente sepolto su un'isola misteriosa. Un giorno s'imbatte in un teschio parlante e scopre che si tratta dei resti del leggendario pirata Barbaros. Il fantasma di Barbaros promette di portare Zack all'isola misteriosa, ma in cambio il giovane pirata dovrà rompere l'incantesimo di cui è vittima, riportandolo così in vita. Per farlo dovrà raccogliere i tesori dai forzieri nascosti in sette luoghi pericolosissimi.

The ghost of Barbaros promises to lead Zack to the island he seeks if the young pirate will lift the curse he has been placed under and bring him back to life by collecting treasure from chests scattered throughout seven dangerous locations.

NL.name: Zack and Wiki™: Quest for Barbaros' Treasure
NL.description: Betreed een wereld vol puzzels en piraterij in het Wii-avontuur Zack and Wiki: Quest for Barbaros' Treasure. Dit puzzelavontuur is door Capcom exclusief voor de Wii ontwikkeld en valt binnen het zogenaamde point-and-click-genre. Je zult al je hersencapaciteit nodig hebben om de beginnende piraat Zack en zijn rechterhand, de aap Wiki, door verbazingwekkende levels te leiden tijdens hun zoektocht naar ongekende rijkdommen. Als leerling-piraat besteed Zack al zijn tijd aan het zoeken naar een lang vergeten schat, waarvan men zegt dat hij op een mysterieus eiland begraven is. Op een dag ontmoet hij een pratende schedel, die deel blijkt uit te maken van de overblijfselen van de legendarische piraat Barbaros. Barbaros' geest belooft dat hij Zack naar het begeerde eiland zal brengen, maar wel onder één voorwaarde. De jonge piraat moet de vloek die over Barbaros is uitgesproken opheffen en hem weer tot leven wekken door allerlei schatten te verzamelen. Deze bevinden zich in schatkisten die verspreid zijn over zeven gevaarlijke locaties.

NZ.name: Zack and Wiki™: Quest for Barbaros' Treasure
NZ.description: Enter a world of puzzles and piracy in Wii adventure Zack and Wiki: Quest for Barbaros’ Treasure. Crafted exclusively for Wii by Capcom, this point-and-click puzzle-solving adventure will have you racking your brains as you guide budding pirate Zack and his sidekick Wiki the monkey through eye-popping levels in search of untold riches. As an apprentice pirate, Zack spends his days searching for a long lost treasure that is said to be buried on a mysterious island. PL.name: Zack and Wiki™: Quest for Barbaros' Treasure
PL.description: Enter a world of puzzles and piracy in Wii adventure Zack and Wiki: Quest for Barbaros’ Treasure. Crafted exclusively for Wii by Capcom, this point-and-click puzzle-solving adventure will have you racking your brains as you guide budding pirate Zack and his sidekick Wiki the monkey through eye-popping levels in search of untold riches. As an apprentice pirate, Zack spends his days searching for a long lost treasure that is said to be buried on a mysterious island. One day, he stumbles across a talking skull that turns out to be part of the remains of legendary pirate Barbaros. The ghost of Barbaros promises to lead Zack to the island he seeks if the young pirate will lift the curse he has been placed under and bring him back to life by collecting treasure from chests scattered throughout seven dangerous locations.

PT.name: Zack and Wiki™: Quest for Barbaros' Treasure
PT.description: Entra num mundo de enigmas e piratas na aventura Wii Zack and Wiki: Quest for Barbaros' Treasure. Criado exclusivamente para a Wii pela Capcom, esta aventura de resolução de enigmas do tipo "point and click" põe-te a dar voltas ao miolo, enquanto guias o promissor pirata Zack e o seu companheiro Wiki, o macaco, através de níveis espantosos em busca de riquezas incalculáveis. Enquanto pirata aprendiz, Zack passa os seus dias em busca de um tesouro há muito perdido, que se diz estar enterrado numa ilha misteriosa. Um dia, ele encontra acidentalmente um crânio falante, que se revela ser parte dos restos mortais do lendário pirata de Barbaros. O fantasma de Barbaros promete guiar Zack até à ilha que ele procura, se o jovem pirata quebrar a maldição que lhe foi lançada e o trouxer de volta à vida, recuperando o tesouro guardado em arcas espalhadas por sete perigosos lugares.

RU.name: Zack and Wiki™: Quest for Barbaros' Treasure
RU.description: Откройте для себя мир пазлов и пиратства в приключенческой игре Zack and Wiki™: Quest for Barbaros’ Treasure. В этой игре в стиле «укажи и щелкни» приключений с элементами пазла, разработанной Capcom для системы Wii™, вы будете ломать голову над тем как провести перспективного пирата Zack и его напарника, обезьянку по имени Wiki, через захватывающие уровни, в поисках неописуемых сокровищ. Будучи пиратом-новичком, Zack проводит все свое время в поисках затерянного сокровища, которое, если верить слухам, закопано где-то на таинственном острове. Однажды он наталкивается на говорящий череп, который, как оказалось, является частью останков легендарного пирата Barbaros. Призрак пирата Barbaros обещает помочь Zack в поисках таинственного острова, если тот, в свою очередь, снимет с заблудшей души проклятие и вернет его к жизни, собирая сокровища из сундуков, спрятанных в семи разных локациях.

SE.name: Zack and Wiki™: Quest for Barbaros' Treasure
SE.description: Enter a world of puzzles and piracy in Wii adventure Zack and Wiki: Quest for Barbaros’ Treasure. Crafted exclusively for Wii by Capcom, this point-and-click puzzle-solving adventure will have you racking your brains as you guide budding pirate Zack and his sidekick Wiki the monkey through eye-popping levels in search of untold riches. The ghost of Barbaros promises to lead Zack to the island he seeks if the young pirate will lift the curse he has been placed under and bring him back to life by collecting treasure from chests scattered throughout seven dangerous locations.

SK.name: Zack and Wiki™: Quest for Barbaros' Treasure
SK.description: Enter a world of puzzles and piracy in Wii adventure Zack and Wiki: Quest for Barbaros’ Treasure. Crafted exclusively for Wii by Capcom, this point-and-click puzzle-solving adventure will have you racking your brains as you guide budding pirate Zack and his sidekick Wiki the monkey through eye-popping levels in search of untold riches. As an apprentice pirate, Zack spends his days searching for a long lost treasure that is said to be buried on a mysterious island. One day, he stumbles across a talking skull that turns out to be part of the remains of legendary pirate Barbaros. The ghost of Barbaros promises to lead Zack to the island he seeks if the young pirate will lift the curse he has been placed under and bring him back to life by collecting treasure from chests scattered throughout seven dangerous locations.
